languages.text: "Вселить ложное чувство безнаказанности, убедить, что прямо сейчас они могут предпринять дерзкий шаг на упреждение".
"Instil a false sense of impunity. Convince them that they can and must act now."
languages.original_text: "Вселить ложное чувство безнаказанности, убедить, что прямо сейчас они могут предпринять дерзкий шаг на упреждение".

traits.locale_text: "instil a false sense of impunity, convince them that they can make a bold pre-emptive move."
"instil a false sense of impunity, convince them that they can make a bold pre-emptive move."
"Instil a false sense of impunity. Convince them that they can make a bold pre-emptive move and get away with it."
"Instil a false sense of impunity. Convince them that they can make a bold pre-emptive move and get away with it."
"Instil a false sense of impunity. Convince them that they can and must act now."
"Instil a false sense of impunity. Convince them that they can and must act now."

languages.text: "Impft ihnen den Irrglauben an, unantastbar zu sein. Überzeugt sie, dass sie jetzt handeln können und müssen."
languages.original_text: "Instil a false sense of impunity. Convince them that they can and must act now."

traits.locale_text: "Impft ihnen den Irrglauben an, unantastbar zu sein. Überzeugt sie, dass sie jetzt handeln können und müssen."

languages.text: «Instiguen una sensación de impunidad falsa. Convénzanlos de que pueden actuar y de que deben hacerlo ahora».
languages.original_text: "Instil a false sense of impunity. Convince them that they can and must act now."

traits.locale_text: «Instiguen una sensación de impunidad falsa. Convénzanlos de que pueden actuar y de que deben hacerlo ahora».

languages.text: 「偽りの不公平感を植え付けろ。今すぐ行動できる…いや、しなければいけないと思わせるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Instil a false sense of impunity. Convince them that they can and must act now."

traits.locale_text: 「偽りの不公平感を植え付けろ。今すぐ行動できる…いや、しなければいけないと思わせるのだ」

languages.text: “向他们灌输不会受到惩罚的错觉，让他们认为必须立刻采取行动。”
languages.original_text: "Instil a false sense of impunity. Convince them that they can and must act now."

traits.locale_text: “向他们灌输不会受到惩罚的错觉，让他们认为必须立刻采取行动。”

languages.text: « Donnez-leur un faux sentiment d'impunité. Persuadez-les qu'ils doivent absolument agir maintenant. »
languages.original_text: "Instil a false sense of impunity. Convince them that they can and must act now."

traits.locale_text: « Donnez-leur un faux sentiment d'impunité. Persuadez-les qu'ils doivent absolument agir maintenant. »

languages.text: "Akıllarına sahte bir dokunulmazlık fikri sokun. Onları eyleme geçebileceklerine ve hemen geçmeleri gerektiğine ikna edin."
languages.original_text: "Instil a false sense of impunity. Convince them that they can and must act now."
